block.box: 1 In this Schedule the following expressions shall have the meaning hereinafter
respectively assigned to them that is to say:
1.1 "Relevant Review Date" means each Review Date specified in the Particulars in
respect of which Rental Value (as hereinafter defined) falls to be agreed or
1.2 "Rent Period" means the period beginning on the Term Commencement date or a
Relevant Review Date (as the case may be) until the expiration of the day before the
next Relevant Review Date thereafter or until the end of the Term (as the case may
1.3 "Rental Value" means the open market rent at which the Premises as a whole or
(where at the Relevant Review Date any part of the Premises shall be underlet) either
the Premises as a whole or the Premises in those parts which reflect the separate
occupations of the Premises (whichever shall produce the greater rental value) might
reasonably be expected to be let in the open market by a willing landlord to a willing
tenant after the expiry of any rent free or reduced rent period which might be allowed
by the willing Landlord to the willing Tenant for the willing Tenant's fit-out works
